nodes.text: Planore was a male who, during the year 3951 BBY, offered to arrange transport off the moon Nar Shaddaa for the Human female Kahranna and her family. He charged Kahranna 50 for a referral to his pilot friend, whom he claimed would take the family off world for 500. However, Planore never came through with his offer of assistance, and Kahranna was forced to rely on Meetra Surik, a former Jedi Knight otherwise known as the Jedi Exile, for help.
Planore's singular appearance in canon is a brief mention by Kahranna in the 2004 role playing video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords by Obsidian Entertainment.
